description: Building on principles presented in 111, second-semester music majors encounter more advanced tonal melodies, rhythmic patterns, and harmonic idioms through singing, aural identification, and notation. Prerequisites: Music 111/113. Co-requisites: Music 114, 162 (or completion of Piano Proficiency Level 2). Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Aural Skills II
notes: Students in 112B must also register for 114B.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 111/113. Co-requisites: Music 114, 162 (or completion of Piano Proficiency Level 2). Offered annually in the spring semester.
